sourcesContent:
import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./searchItem.css"; const SearchItem = ({item,index}) => { const photo = [ "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1618773928121-c32242e63f39?fm=jpg&q=60&w=3000&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8aG90ZWx8ZW58MHx8MHx8fDA%3D", "https://thumbs.dreamstime.com/b/luxury-hotel-room-master-bedroom-creative-ai-design-background-instagram-facebook-wall-painting-photo-wallpaper-backgrounds-325040660.jpg", "https://cf.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/max1024x768/385388071.jpg?k=de0b51f296a3d9431866b51b974921c9ebb50cacf08eb55c1eec1d468849ffe2&o=&hp=1", "", "https://cdn.britannica.com/96/115096-050-5AFDAF5D/Bellagio-Hotel-Casino-Las-Vegas.jpg", "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1618773928121-c32242e63f39?fm=jpg&q=60&w=3000&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8aG90ZWx8ZW58MHx8MHx8fDA%3D", "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1618773928121-c32242e63f39?fm=jpg&q=60&w=3000&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8aG90ZWx8ZW58MHx8MHx8fDA%3D" ] return (

{item.name}

{item.distance} Free airport taxi Studio Apartment with Air conditioning {item.description} Free cancellation You can cancel later, so lock in this great price today!
{item.rating &&
Excellent
}
${item.cheapestPrice} Includes taxes and fees
); }; export default SearchItem;
